item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Gleb ðŸ‘‹ I’m very passionate about game development. Worked at many indie projects of different scale as a developer, manager, and advisor. I’ve just created this website, more content is coming soon ðŸ˜¸ Background In 2016 joined GameInsight as a game developer working on mobile and AR games, but quit after two years to found my own company - Dragonglass. Developed and launched the world’s first blockchain mobile game along with the Dragonglass ICO.
